name: Paper-Dev
description:
Paper-Dev is a sidescrolling platformer with a hand drawn paper cutout art style.

This is a game I made for the AIE December game jam 2022. The theme was Game Development, specifically the different disciplines (game art, design and programming) and helping potential students to decide which area of game development they would like to study.

This was my 1st ever game jam and I decided to go solo. It was a steep learning curve, but I'm glad I took part and learned some new skills.
